  • java.lang.Object
    • com.funzio.pure2D.BaseDisplayObject

    DisplayObject, InvalidateFlags, Manipulatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayObject

      • setOrigin

        public final void setOrigin(PointF origin)
        Specified by:
        setOrigin in interface DisplayObject
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin to set. Origin is the local point and (0,0) by default. Origin is used to define offset of this object and also the center of rotation and scaling.
